SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator user with peer-to-peer access to the entire application.
AdventureBook
Represents a book classified under the adventure genre, primarily focused on the exploits and experiences of a central character.
AllegoricalBook
Represents a book classified under the allegorical genre that employs allegory as a primary narrative device.
Autobiography
Represents a book classified under the autobiography genre that focuses on the life of a particular subject.
BannedClient
Represents a customer who has been banned from making purchases.
Book
An abstract base class for a book that provides a common structure and functionality for all book types.
BookController
Controller for managing the display of book information.
BookDAO
The BookDAO class is responsible for managing all database access related to books in the application.
BookFactory
The BookFactory class provides a factory method for creating instances of Book subclasses based on a given genre.
BrowseController
Controller of the view interface in the application, controlling the display of books and navigation between different sections of the application.
CardController
Controller for managing the display of book cards.
CategorieController
This class represents a controller for managing categories in an application.
Client
Represents a client user in the system.
ControllerForEveryBook
This class represents a controller for displaying information about each book and handling user interaction with individual books in a particular section of the application.
DAO<T>
An interface that represents a data access object (DAO) for generic types.
DramaBook
Represents a book classified under the drama genre that focuses on a particular main character.
FamilyBook
Represents a book classified under the family genre that may include additional suitability criteria for children.
FavoritesObserverImpl
Implementation of the FavouritesObserver interface that interacts with a data access object (DAO).
FavouritesController
Manages the display and management of the user's favourite books.
FavouritesObservable
Interface for objects that can observe changes in the list of favourite books.
FavouritesObserver
Interface for monitoring changes in the list of favourite books.
FictionBook
Represents a specific type of book, specifically fiction, extending the generic Book class.
HelloApplication
The HelloApplication class represents the main entry point for the JavaFX application.
HistoryController
The HistoryController class controls the functionality of the history page in the application.
Launcher
The class is designed to start the general application
LoginController
Controller for managing login and registration functionality.
MainClientConroller
Controller for managing the main client functionality.
Movement
Interface for defining movement actions in the application.
NotBannedClient
Represents a client who is not restricted from making something or any other client-specific activities.
ProfileAdminController
Controller class for the administrator profile interface.
ProfileController
Controller class for the user profile interface.
QuizController
Manages the quiz section of the app, guiding the tournament-style book selection process.
QuizPageController
A controller class for the quiz page interface.
Recommend
A class responsible for creating book recommendations for users based on their favourite genres.
SerializationBooks
Provides utility methods for serializing and deserializing book lists to and from persistent storage.
SerializationForCountOfPeople
Provides utilities for serialising and deserialising a static people count to and from a data file.
StatisticsAboutTopBookController
A controller class for displaying statistics about the most popular books.
TopBooksController
A controller class for displaying the most popular books.
TopSectionController
Controller class for the top section of the application.
UnauthorizedAccessException
A user exception used to indicate that a user has attempted to perform an operation without the required permissions.
User
An abstract base class that represents a user in the system.
UserDAO
The UserDAO class is responsible for managing the interaction of user data with the database.
ValidationException
Exception class for handling validation errors.
VotingController
Controller class for the voting functionality in the application.
